description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

CustomPluginFileDescription.description: Details about the custom plugin file.

FileMd5.description: The hex-encoded MD5 checksum of the custom plugin file. You can use it to validate the file.

FileSize.description: The size in bytes of the custom plugin file. You can use it to validate the file.

CustomPluginLocation.description: Information about the location of a custom plugin.

S3Location.description: The S3 bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN), file key, and object version of the plugin file stored in Amazon S3.

BucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an S3 bucket.

FileKey.description: The file key for an object in an S3 bucket.

ObjectVersion.description: The version of an object in an S3 bucket.

Name.description: The name of the custom plugin.

Description.description: A summary description of the custom plugin.

CustomPluginArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom plugin to use.

ContentType.description: The type of the plugin file.

Revision.description: The revision of the custom plugin.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
